title: How to make someone feel special online - Quora

response.answer_text: Online romance and or online anything never really last. You only exist when and if the person come online; reality check. But if you insist; 1. throwing some healthy compliments here and there would get things rolling. Paying attention and being a listening ear would help. 2. You never complain when they dump their problems on you as if you were their personal therapist. 3. Check on them whenever you can albeit don’t make it everyday or multiple times in a day nor your full time job. 4. Go old school and send them a special song with really good lyrics. 5. An e-card inquiring about their day. 6. Answering promptly when chatting with them also helps. 7. etc.

Casually ask for permission to know their location and send the person flowers. It can be creepy to someone you've never met so in that instance just provide them with your time. Pay attention to them and be interested in what they are interested in. Or at least be invested in it.
